summary: Provides a collection of element classes that wrap various content types—such as plain text, files, dataframes, PDFs, Plotly and Matplotlib visualizations, custom UI components, and task structures—and manage their creation, serialization, telemetry logging, and transmission to the Chainlit frontend UI.
business_intent: Enable the backend to generate, track, and send rich interactive UI elements and task information to the Chainlit user interface, simplifying data exchange, visualization, and task orchestration for conversational AI applications.
